name: A long day to come
description:
A long day to come is mean to be a visual/narative game where your choices change your progression.
Today is not your day, and death is waiting for you if you are not carefull enough.
Your main goal is to delay the inevitable by taking good decisions.

PS : Unfortunately, i did not get enough time at all so the game is only a technical prototype with the introduction scene.
I'm still proud of the global result and hope this will satisfy you as it satisfy me to look everything assemble so well.
